Key Match Events: Jose Altuve hit a walk-off double to score Jake Meyers and win the game for the Astros
Royals third baseman Paul DeJong tied the game with a two-run homer in the top of the ninth
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Joe Espada praised Jose Altuve's performance
Paul DeJong commented on Framber Valdez's pitching
Miscellaneous Highlights: Framber Valdez threw seven no-hit innings
Josh Hader's consecutive saves streak was snapped at 29 games
Others: The Astros won their third game in a row
The game was the third no-hit bid of at least seven innings for the Astros this year
